articles.author: Shubhajit Roy
articles.title: Don't jail journalists for what they say… India a democracy: Germany - The Indian Express
articles.description: The spokesperson at the German ministry said that they are in contact with European Union partners, and freedom of press is part of discussions between the EU and India.
articles.content: DAYS AFTER the arrest of Mohammed Zubair, the co-founder of fact-checker website Alt News, on charges of promoting religious enmity in a tweet from 2018, the German Foreign ministry referred to the c… [+2736 chars]

articles.author: Anthony Cuthbertson
articles.title: Facebook and Instagram face Europe ban over privacy dispute - The Independent
articles.description: Both  social media apps have more than 300 million users in Europe
articles.content:
Facebook and Instagram could be forced offline in Europe after an Irish watchdog ruled that their parent company Meta could not share Europeans data with the US.
